item.title: How I manage my work like a boss
item.description: If you have deadlines on top of people asking you to do stuff ASAP, on top of issues that need to be fixed immediately, on top of many meetings throughout the day, it’s easy to lose track of your to do list or prioritise the wrong things. My to do list method has helped me keep an overview of everything I need to do. It’s low overhead once you get used to it.
